name: looq
description:
Made as a part of IndiQ Quantum game jam

You are a piece of code, in a seemingly normal world. Follow the word, for the word is The Word. The world is... or is it?

Code scripts and partial media derivatives used from DaFlufflyPotato's pygame tutorials for platformers.

Qiskit used for random generations. Needs pygame and qiskit to play. Additional dependencies include math and numpy.

run with `python3 looq.py`
